review: I am basing this review after only a couple of days of use, and for the most part in comparison to my only other streaming device, a vizio blu ray player.  First of all, it does exactly what it is suppose to.  Second of all, while I do sometimes like using a remote, it is fantastic that I can control this device from my phone and computer.  The app on my vizio was outdated and the processing was sluggish, this device responds quickly, and still has a great picture even though it is over wifi.Not sure how I go along without my chromecast for so long, but I absolutely love it.  Still not keen on many apps available for this device yet, but streaming through netflix, pandora, and youtube is flawless.
